Efficient Better manage employees without constant oversight so you can concentrate on other aspects of your business. The Fingercheck Difference Moving You Forward We partner with you in providing support and opportunities to grow your business in the most efficient, economical way possible. 24/7 Access and Management Our cloud-based platform provides real-time access to your entire workforce. Enjoy easy access and complete control from anywhere, at any time. Everything. Simplified. We've developed our own, proprietary technology designed to eliminate time consuming processes; automating them with a single click. Backed by a Powerful Backend To keep all your data flowing seamlessly from punch in to payroll and beyond, our slick, proprietary backend handles thousands of computations every second. Access it anytime on any device, and take control while keeping your cool. Never Rollover Payroll Again In partnership with Infinity Capital Funding, Fingercheck helps you make payroll every week-even when cash flow is thin. With instant funds available in time for your weekly, biweekly or monthly payroll, you can focus on long-term goals without worrying about which client check clears when. Cloud based Time attendance & workforce management software TIME CLOCK SOFTWARE FOR YOUR BUSINESS FingerCheck Time Attendance Software is ideal for small to medium-sized businesses in need of a streamlined time-tracking solution. Our online time clock system is designed to make logging hours an effortless process, as employees can easily use it anywhere in the world and access all of their information online. Using manual timecards can be a time-consuming and inexact process. Now, thanks to Fingercheck, your company will save valuable time and money. This 21st-century solution makes organizing and tracking hours simple so you can turn your attention back to the work that matters. Testimonials Unfortunately a few months ago our offices were destroyed by hurricane sandy. Our files were lost and we were forced to move, it was horrible. One of the positives was thankfully we were using FingerCheck. All of our hours were stored in the cloud and we used the mobile app to punch from our temporary office. They even sent us a brand new clock at an unbelievably low and discounted price! Adam Gold We have a small family owned and operated store in Indiana. I am not the most computer savvy person in the world so support is very important to me. From the moment we signed up we had a dedicated rep working with me every step of the way. We couldn't be happier! Linda Turner Our employees are mainly on the road going from client to client. We would have no idea where they were and if they showed up to meetings on time. We now require them to use the FingerCheck Mobile App. The app allows them to punch in on the go. It gives us their GPS coordinates so we know they are actually there! Sam L. The FingerCheck application has made my job as the store manager a whole lot easier. I like every part of it! Jacob K. Absolutely amazing and intuitive. I've used it many times on the go. The Mobile App is amazing and has saved me so many time. I have instituted a policy that our employees are required to call me if they forgot to punch , are at another location or if they are at a meeting in the field. Instead of writing it down, I do it on the spot using the app on my Android phone . I'm thoroughly impressed and I kind of enjoy using it lol. Stuart A. Online Time Clock The efficiency you'll find in an online time clock makes it the new standard of employee time-tracking. With time clock software from FingerCheck, you receive a number of advanced features with your subscription to make your job even easier, including advanced reporting payroll integration, employee reporting, as well as job costing, which comes standard with each plan. Need to email reports and time cards? No problem! In fact, with our time clock app, you can track our employees from anywhere with an internet connection. Streamline your payroll process today with the state-of-the-art time-tracking system from FingerCheck. Time Clock App: Take Your Time-Tracking Wherever You Go! The time clock app from FingerCheck allows managers to track their employees while on the go. The app is convenient for drivers, salesmen, and businesspeople who travel often, and it can be used to access all your information via the app available for any smart phone or using any web browser. You can even receive daily alerts detailing employee tardiness and absences. The user-friendly interface makes it simple for anyone to use, and full reports and analyses can easily be accessed at any time, anywhere. Available on both the Android Market and iPhone App Store, the time clock software is an affordable solution that works for you. Upgrade your outdated time-tracking system; Fingercheck utilizes the latest technology to increase efficiency, usability, and improves payroll accuracy. Time Clock App: Take Your Time-Tracking Wherever You Go!
